item.title: 瑞士宝盛在清理 Benko 案件过程中客户资金流入加速
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）上半年的客户资金流入速度加快，这表明这家瑞士财富管理公司正开始走出去年 Signa 房地产丑闻引发的低谷。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. saw inflows of client funds accelerate in the first half, a sign that the Swiss wealth manager is starting to pull out of the slump induced by last year’s Signa real estate scandal.】

item.title: 对美国消费者而言，降息不能来得太早
item.description:
信用卡债务压力明显，而经济下的构造板块有移动的迹象。【原文：

Pressure is apparent in credit card debt, while there are signs of tectonic plates shifting under the economy.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

 

】

item.title: 收益疲软引发评级下调，安信银行股价暴跌
item.description: 由于资产质量恶化和信贷成本上升，印度 Axis 银行第一季度盈利不及预期，该公司股价下跌。至少有五家券商下调了该股的评级。【原文：Axis Bank Ltd.’s shares declined after the Indian lender’s first-quarter earnings missed estimates on worsening asset quality and elevated credit costs. At least five brokerages downgraded the stock.】

item.title: 瑞银因 3.5 亿美元逃税案受到美国参议员质询
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）被一位有权势的美国立法者问及，其收购的银行瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）是否没有报告一名被控逃税 3.5 亿美元收入的美国人。【原文：UBS Group AG was asked by a powerful US lawmaker about whether the bank it acquired, Credit Suisse Group AG, failed to report an American accused of evading taxes on $350 million in income.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行（SocGen）和美国银行（BofA）称，挪威克朗汇率下跌趋势已经结束，是时候买入挪威克朗了
item.description: 随着挪威克朗接近一年多来的最弱水平，货币策略师和投资者正抓住这一机会，押注挪威克朗将从十国集团排名的末位攀升至首位。【原文：Currency strategists and investors are seizing on Norway’s krone as it approaches the weakest level in over a year, betting it will climb from near the bottom toward the top of the Group-of-10 ranking.】

item.title: 比特币、以太币下滑，避险情绪蔓延加密货币市场
item.description: 随着股市暴跌，全球市场的不安情绪蔓延，第二大代币以太币引领了数字资产的下跌。【原文：Ether, the second-largest token, paced a drop in digital assets following a slump in equities that spread unease in global markets.】

item.title: Ares 和大华银行为黑石办公楼再融资后出售被撤
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone Real Estate Partners LP 已从 Ares Management Corp. 和 United Overseas Bank Ltd. 获得一笔贷款，用于为悉尼一栋商业办公楼进行再融资。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone Real Estate Partners LP has received a loan from Ares Management Corp. and United Overseas Bank Ltd. to refinance an existing facility that funded a commercial office block in Sydney, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度对投机性交易的担忧日益强烈
铜价跌破 9000 美元门槛，金属跌势加剧
item.description: 铜价暴跌，自 4 月初以来首次跌破每吨 9,000 美元的门槛，原因是对全球尤其是中国的需求前景日益悲观。【原文：Copper tumbled — falling below the $9,000 a ton threshold for the first time since early April — on increasing pessimism on the global, and particularly the Chinese, demand outlook.】

item.title: 印度觊觎全球海鲜大蛋糕，虾类股票大涨
item.description: 本周，在印度政府宣布帮助当地水产养殖公司在不断增长的全球市场中占据更大份额的建议之后，虾农成为印度最热门的股票交易之一。【原文：Shrimp farmers have been among the hottest stock trades in India this week after the government announced proposals to help local aquaculture firms capture a bigger share of a growing global market.】

item.title: 精选医疗集团旗下康采恩在美国首次公开募股中融资 5.29 亿美元
item.description: 选择医疗控股公司（Select Medical Holdings Corp.【原文：Select Medical Holdings Corp.’s occupational health services provider Concentra raised $529 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares toward the bottom a marketed range.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空集团股东在美国首次公开募股中筹资 4.56 亿美元
item.description: 拉塔姆航空集团（Latam Airlines Group SA）的一批股东通过首次公开发行美国存托股票筹集了 4.56 亿美元。【原文：A group of Latam Airlines Group SA shareholders raised $456 million in an initial public offering of American depositary shares.】

item.title: 日经指数因人工智能押注失败和日本央行担忧而走向修正
item.description: 随着人工智能推动的科技股涨势逆转，以及对日本央行准备加息的担忧加剧，日本日经 225 日经平均指数（Nikkei 225 Stock Average）将出现技术性修正。【原文：Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average headed for a technical correction as an AI-driven rally in technology shares went into reverse and concerns grew that the Bank of Japan is poised to hike interest rates.】

item.title: 延迟降息导致亚洲房地产投资下降 13
item.description: 根据研究机构世邦魏理仕集团（CBRE Group Inc.【原文：Asia Pacific commercial real estate investment volume declined by 13% the three months ended in June compared with the previous quarter to $22.9 billion, according to data from researcher CBRE Group Inc.】

item.title: 交易员押注大转折点终将到来，日元大涨
item.description: 在越来越多的人预期日本和美国之间的利率差距最终将缩小的情况下，日元拐点的迹象越来越明显。【原文：Signs of an inflection point for the yen are mounting amid growing expectations that the interest rate gap between Japan and the US is finally set to shrink.】

item.title: 中国意外下调一年期政策利率，降幅为 2020 年以来最大
item.description: 中国人民银行出人意料地将一年期政策性贷款利率下调了2020年4月以来的最大降幅，此前还意外下调了关键的短期利率，以提振放缓的经济活动。【原文：The People’s Bank of China unexpectedly lowered the rate on its one-year policy loans by the most since April 2020, following a surprise reduction to a key short-term rate to boost slowing economic activity.】

item.title: 美国推迟一周决定越南的市场经济地位
item.description: 拜登政府决定是否将越南列为市场经济国家，这一举措可能会促进这个东南亚国家的出口。【原文：The announcement of the Biden administration’s decision on whether to classify Vietnam as a market economy, a step that could boost the Southeast Asian nation’s exports, has been extended by a week and will be taken by Aug. 2.】

item.title: 中国股市需要比央行降息更多的帮助
item.description: 尽管央行本周降息，但中国股市仍在下滑。股市继续面临国内消费放缓和严峻的国际不利因素的挑战。通常被视为中国经济健康状况晴雨表的铁矿石和铜等工业金属也在下滑。【原文：China’s stock market is slumping despite the central bank’s interest-rate cut this week. Equities continue to face challenges from slowing domestic consumption and harsh international headwinds. Industrial metals such as iron ore and copper, often regarded as a barometer of the health of the Chinese economy, are also slumping.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市迎来了新的现实。收益率曲线变得更加陡峭。印度可能修改新债券发行规则。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US equities get a fresh dose of reality. The yield curve turns steeper. India may amend rules for the issuance of new bonds. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国原油库存连续第四周减少，原油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于美国原油库存再次下降，以及俄罗斯承诺额外减产，以弥补超过欧佩克+配额的抽油量，原油在五个交易日以来首次上涨后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after posting the first gain in five sessions, as US crude inventories dropped again and Russia pledged to make extra production cuts to compensate for pumping above its OPEC+ quota.】

item.title: 台积电拥挤不堪，基金转向韩国投资人工智能股票
item.description: 投资者在寻找进入人工智能领域的途径时，将目光从台湾转向了韩国。【原文：Investors searching for ways to navigate into the artificial intelligence story are turning their sights away from Taiwan and toward South Korea.】

item.title: 熊猫债券销售创纪录，廉价信贷吸引全球发行人
item.description: 今年迄今为止，熊猫债券的销售额跃升至创纪录的 170 亿美元，因为外国借款人纷纷涌入中国在岸市场，以寻求更低的借贷成本。【原文：Sales of panda bonds jumped to a record $17 billion so far this year, as foreign borrowers piled into China’s onshore market in search of cheaper borrowing costs.】

item.title: 全球股市因人工智能反思而下跌，日元走强：市场综述
item.description: 随着投资者开始回撤今年推动牛市的人工智能狂潮，亚洲股市将出现下跌。【原文：Equities in Asia were set to decline as investors began to pullback on the artificial-intelligence frenzy that has powered the bull market this year.】

item.title: Lineage 美国首次公开发行股票的定价为每股 78 美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，温控存储和物流巨头 Lineage 公司在扩大后的首次公开募股中筹集了超过 40 亿美元的资金，这是今年最大的首次股票销售。【原文：Temperature-controlled storage and logistics giant Lineage Inc. raised more than $4 billion in an enlarged initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, in the year’s biggest first-time share sale.】

item.title: 麦格理称大宗商品与市场部实现交易增长
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）表示，受北美天然气和电力交易活动增加的支持，其主要商品和全球市场业务有所增长，从而推动了利润的增长。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. said profit was buoyed by an uptick in its key commodities and global markets business, supported by increased trading activity in north American gas and power.】

item.title: 中国收益率曲线陡峭化贸易获得牵引力，但需注意一些问题
item.description: 随着中国央行努力更好地控制债券市场，并发出经济更健康的信号，长短期收益率之间的差距正在扩大。【原文：A popular Treasuries trade is being replicated in China, where the gap between long and short-dated yields is widening as the central bank pushes to better control the bond market and signal a healthier economy.】

item.title: 贝莱德预计日本央行将长期维持利率不变，利好股市
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to stand pat on interest rates for longer in a boost to the nation’s equities, according to BlackRock Inc., which has a high conviction investment view on Japanese stocks.】

item.title: 杠杆科技赌注在吸金 20 亿美元后被压垮
item.description: 在最近人工智能推动的科技股大涨中，逢低买入一直是一个制胜策略。但现在却适得其反，这对那些利用加大赌注来扩大收益的人来说尤其痛苦。【原文：Buying the dip has been a winning strategy during the recent epic AI-fueled rally in technology shares. It’s backfiring now — and is especially excruciating for those who used amped-up wagers to amplify returns.】

item.title: 加拿大银行改弦更张，因为消费者显示他们受到了伤害
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）对央行击垮通胀充满信心，因此他对央行的决策过程进行了调整。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem is so confident the central bank has crushed inflation that he’s tweaked its decision-making process — officials are now setting interest rates to prevent price pressures from slowing too much.】
